name: check-msawk
title: Metal Slug : Awakening
description: Memeriksa nama/nickname pemain Metal Slug : Awakening berdasarkan User ID.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.label: User ID
parameters.placeholder: Masukkan User ID Metal Slug Anda

curl:
curl -X POST https://bovalone.me/api/check-msawk \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_API_KEY" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"user_id":"12345678"}'
